summary: A colored version of the Iron Armor.
descriptionHtml:
This is a colored version for both male and female Iron Armor. Male is red, female is green. 
I modified the color of the chest to give it a \"raw\" appereance and added a \"nordic symbol\" on the back.
It also affects the NPGs that wear Iron Armor.
This is my first and non professional mod.
It\'s not an HD texture. 
Enjoy!

INSTALL:
Extract the \"textures\" folder, into your Skirim\\Data folder. Merge if asked to.

UNINSTALL:
Delete the folder named \"Iron\" from the \"Skirim\\Data\\Textures\\Armor\" folder.
or
Delete the files named \"curiassplate.dds\" from the \"Skirim\\Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Iron\\f\" folder AND from the \"Skirim\\Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Iron\\m\" folder.

Credits:
Bethesda for the original texture.
Myself for Photoshop modifications.
author: Caabal
